original.translation[0].definitions[0].d: existing or happening first, before other people or things
original.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The land was returned to its original owner.
The kitchen still has many original features (=parts that were there when the house was first built).
the original meaning of the word
The original plan was to fly out to New York.
original.translation[0].definitions[1].d: completely new and different from anything that anyone has thought of before
original.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I don’t think George is capable of having original ideas!
That’s not a very original suggestion.
original.translation[0].definitions[2].d: an original work of art is the one that was made by the artist and is not a copy
original.translation[0].definitions[2].e: The original painting is now in the National Gallery in London.
original.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a work of art or a document that is not a copy, but is the one produced by the writer or artist
original.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The colours are much more striking in the original.
I’ll keep a copy of the contract, and give you the original.
original.translation[1].definitions[1].d: someone whose behaviour, clothing etc is unusual and amusing
original.translation[2].definitions[0].e: Which is the original document and which is the copy?
The index-linked certificates were paying indexation plus 4% of theoriginal investment.
